programme.desc: Western starring Clark Gable as a Civil War veteran who, with his brother Cameron Mitchell, takes up crooked cattleman Robert Ryan's offer to be trail boss on a big cattle drive.
programme.title: The Tall Men

programme.desc: Alexander Korda's dramatic film is set on the Northwest Frontier of India where young prince Sabu helps the British defeat his evil uncle (Raymond Massey), who murdered his father.
programme.title: The Drum

programme.desc: Sam Peckinpah's classic western starring Randolph Scott as a lawman turned sharpshooter who plans to steal gold from a remote mining town. With Joel McCrea.
programme.title: Ride the High Country

programme.desc: Aishwarya Rai is a member of a secret clan of women, who draw on the mystical properties of Indian spices to cure anything from heartache to heartburn, and is pursued by two lovers.
programme.title: The Mistress of Spices

programme.desc: The Addams Family welcome baby Pubert to the clan. But sister Wednesday (Christina Ricci) and brother Pugsley (Jimmy Workman) are less than friendly...
programme.title: Addams Family Values

programme.desc: Director James Cameron talks about his career, including Aliens, The Abyss and his Oscar-winning film, Avatar.
programme.title: Avatar Special

programme.desc: Paul Haggis's Oscar-winning movie weaves stories covering bigotry and racism in Los Angeles. With Matt Dillon, Don Cheadle, Sandra Bullock. Very strong language/violent scenes. [AD,S]
programme.title: Crash

programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville, Bam Margera, Steve-O, Chris Pontius and the rest of the gang return with more stunts that are do-not-try perilous and disgusting by turns. Strong language/violence.
programme.title: Jackass Number Two

programme.desc: John Badham's iconic film stars John Travolta as a champion disco dancer hoping to win the prize that will get him out of the ghetto. Very strong, offensive language/sexual violence.
programme.title: Saturday Night Fever

programme.subtitle: ...Special
programme.desc: Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Rhys Ifans and director Marc Webb talk about bringing the new version of Spider-Man to the screen.
programme.title: Amazing Spider-Man Interview...
